ValidationRule.description: The Disposition Code is a required field when the Lead Stage is in MQO or SAO and the Lead is being rejected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ispickval(Status, "Rejected - Return to Nurture Stream"), ispickval(Status, "Rejected - Disqualify") ),
OR( ispickval (Lead_Stage__c, "MQO"), ispickval (Lead_Stage__c, "SAO") ),
OR( Ispickval( MQO_SAO_Disposition_Code__c , "") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Disposition code is required when rejecting a Lead in the MQO or SAO Lead Stage. Please select a dispostion code and save your changes.
